tbcdnzjqx5bgxndg.content:
title: Hello World
---
Welcome to [Hexo](http://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](http://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [trobuleshooting](http://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/tommy351/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](http://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](http://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](http://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](http://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)

  _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);

    ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';

tsyybg9uf5i1g8xg.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <%
  var title = page.title;

  if (is_archive()){
    title = 'Archives';

    if (is_month()){
      title += ': ' + page.year + '/' + page.month;
    } else if (is_year()){
      title += ': ' + page.year;
    }
  } else if (is_category()){
    title = 'Category: ' + page.category;
  } else if (is_tag()){
    title = 'Tag: ' + page.tag;
  }
  %>
  <title><% if (title){ %><%= title %> | <% } %><%= config.title %></title>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">
  <%- open_graph({twitter_id: theme.twitter, google_plus: theme.google_plus, fb_admins: theme.fb_admins, fb_app_id: theme.fb_app_id}) %>
  <% if (theme.rss){ %>
    <link rel="alternative" href="<%- theme.rss %>" title="<%= config.title %>" type="application/atom+xml">
  <% } %>
  <% if (theme.favicon){ %>
    <link rel="icon" href="<%- theme.favicon %>">
  <% } %>
  <link href="//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Source+Code+Pro" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css">
  <%- css('css/style') %>
  <%- partial('google-analytics') %>
</head>

<% if (!usercfg.updated) return; if (!usercfg.themeconfig) usercfg.themeconfig = theme; hexo.__ = function(item){ return function(str,opt){ var s = __(item?item + '.' + str:str); if (item && s == item + '.' + str) return (opt===false?false:str); return s?s:(opt===false?false:str); } } this.iTags = {}; iTags.ilink = function(match,content,br){ var data = {},posts; var ilink_args = /(\w+)\s*:\s*(.+)$/.exec(content); var attr = ilink_args[1]; var f = ilink_args[2]; if (attr == 'tag'){posts = site.tags;data['name'] = f;}else if (attr == 'cat' || attr == 'category'){posts = site.categories;data['name'] = f;}else{posts = site.posts;data[attr] = f;} var post = posts.findOne(data); return post?'' + (post.title?post.title:f) + '' + (br?'
':''):''; }; iTags.ijs = function(match,content){ return eval(content); }; var oldDate = site.posts.sort('date',0).first().date.format('YYYY'); var newDate = new Date().getFullYear(); if (oldDate < newDate) usercfg.SiteDate = oldDate + '-' + newDate; else usercfg.SiteDate = newDate; var load_static_widgets = function(name){ if (UserConfig.ajax_widgets) return "
正在加载...
"; if (!UserConfig.cached_widgets.hasOwnProperty(name)){ var str = _partial('_widgets/static/' + name,{name: name}); UserConfig.cached_widgets[name] = str; } return UserConfig.cached_widgets[name]; } var load_widgets = function(name,item,index){ if (name.search('_') >= 0 && index) return ""; var str="
"; var widgets = []; var theme_widgets = []; if (UserConfig.widgets && UserConfig.widgets[name]) theme_widgets = UserConfig.widgets[name]; if (item && item.widgets && item.widgets[name]){ item.widgets[name].forEach(function(widget){ if (widget == '+'){//+代表加载主题指定的widgets theme_widgets.forEach(function(n){ if (widgets.indexOf(widget) == -1) widgets.push(n); }) } else if (widgets.indexOf(widget) == -1) widgets.push(widget); }) } else if (!item || ((!item.widgets || item.widgets.theme !== false) && (item.layout !== 'page' || name.search('_') < 0))){//对于页面默认不加载文章前后相关的widgets widgets = widgets.concat(theme_widgets); } widgets.forEach(function(widget){ str += '
'; str += _partial('_widgets/' + widget,{pos: name,item: item,name: widget}); str += '
'; }); str +='
'; return str; } this.UserConfig = _.extend({ajax_widgets: true,load_widgets: load_widgets,load_static_widgets: load_static_widgets},hexo.config,usercfg,usercfg.themeconfig); usercfg.updated = false; %>

<script type="text/x-mathjax-config">
  MathJax.Hub.Config({
    tex2jax: {
      skipTags: ['script', 'noscript', 'style', 'textarea', 'pre', 'code'],
      inlineMath: [ ['$','$'], ["\\(","\\)"] ],
      processEscapes: true
    }
  });
  MathJax.Hub.Queue(function() {
    var all = MathJax.Hub.getAllJax(), i;
    for(i=0; i < all.length; i += 1) {
      all[i].SourceElement().parentNode.className += ' has-jax';
    }
  });
</script>

8idpp50pdek2ljs4.content:
<script type="text/javascript">
   var lang=["bsh", "c", "cc", "cpp", "cs", "csh", "cyc", "cv", "htm", "html",
    "java", "js", "m", "mxml", "perl", "pl", "pm", "py", "rb", "sh",
    "xhtml", "xml", "xsl"];
   var pretty_base='';
   $('script').each(function(){
	var c = $(this).attr('src');
	if (!c)
	    return;
	if (c.match(/(\/)?prettify(\.min)?\.js/i))
	{
	    var index = c.lastIndexOf('/');
	    if (index != -1)
		pretty_base = c.substr(0,index + 1);
	    return false;
	}
   })
   $('pre code').each(function(){
	var c = $(this).attr('class')
	if (!c)
	    return;
	c = c.match(/\s?(lang\-\w+)/i);
	if (c && lang.indexOf(c[1]) == -1)
	{
	    lang.push(c[1]);
	    $.getScript(pretty_base + c[1] + '.min.js');
	}
   })

    $(window).load(function(){
       $("pre").addClass("prettyprint");
       prettyPrint();
    })
</script>

<% partial('module'); var title = ''; var sub_cats = []; if (page.category) { title = page.category; var cur_category = site.categories.findOne({name: page.category}); site.categories.sort('name').each(function(item,i){ if (item.parent && item.parent == cur_category._id) sub_cats.push(''+item.name+''+ item.length +''); }); title += '' + sub_cats.join(' ') + ''; } if (page.tag) title = page.tag; if (page.archive){ if (page.year) title = page.year + (page.month ? '/' + page.month : ''); else title = __('archive_a'); } %>

<%- title %>

<% if (pagination == 2){ %> <% page.posts.each(function(item){ %> <%- partial('article', {item: item, index: true}) %> <% }); %> <%- partial('pagination') %> <%return;}%>
<% var posts = page.posts.sort('date',-1); var item_data = ''; var item_year = ''; var item_arr = {}; posts.each(function(item,id){ var this_year = item.date.year(); if (this_year != item_year){ if (item_data.length){ item_data += ''; item_arr[item_year]= item_data; } item_year = this_year; item_data='
    '; } item_data +='
  • '; item_data +='

    ' + item.date.format(UserConfig.date_format) +' '; item_data +=partial('post/title',{item: item,index: true}); item_data +='

    '; if (!item.description){ if (item.excerpt) item.description = item.excerpt; else if (typeof(auto_keyword_desc) == 'function'){ var desc = auto_keyword_desc(item.raw.substr(item.raw.search('---') + 5)); var t = desc.match(/content="(.*?)"/); if (t) item.description = t[1]; } } if (item.description) item_data += '

    ' + item.description + '

    '; }) item_arr[item_year] = item_data; var show_all = (posts.length <= 10); var item_keys = Object.keys(item_arr); if (item_keys.length == 1){%> <%- item_arr[item_keys[0]]%> <%}else{ var nav_tabs = ['
  • 全部

  • '+item+'

<% if (!item.thread) { if (item.wordpress_id) item.thread = item.wordpress_id; else if (item.id) item.thread = item.id; else if (item.slug) item.thread = item.slug; } page.thread = item.thread; if (item.layout == "link") item.comments = false; if (!page.keywords && UserConfig.keywords) page.keywords = UserConfig.keywords; var item_meta = []; if (item.categories && item.categories.length) { var cats = []; item.categories.forEach(function(cat){ if (!cat.parent) cats.push('
  • ' + cat.name + '
    • '); else cats[cats.length - 1] += '
  • ' + cat.name + '
    • '; }); item_meta.push('
    ' + __('Posted in') + '' + cats.join('') + '
    '); } if (item.tags && item.tags.length){ var tags = []; item.tags.forEach(function(tag,i){ tags.push('' + tag.name + ''); }); item_meta.push('' + __('Tagged') + ' ' + tags.join("") + ''); } if (item.updated) item_meta.push(''+ __('updated') + ': ' + item.updated.format(UserConfig.date_format)+ ''); if (item.comments && UserConfig.comments.provider && UserConfig.comments.show_count) item_meta.push('' + partial('../_comments/'+UserConfig.comments.provider+"_comment_count") + ''); -%>

rmoie0youf8w57zh.content:
<meta charset="utf-8">
<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge">
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
<%
var title = [];
if (page.current > 1) title.push(__('page', page.current));
if (page.title) title.push(page.title);
if (page.category) title.push(page.category);
if (page.tag) title.push(page.tag);
if (page.archive){
  if (page.year) title.push(__('archive_b', page.year + (page.month ? '/' + page.month : '')));
  else title.push(__('archive_a'));
}
title.push(UserConfig.title);
%>
<title><%= title.join(' | ') %></title>
<% if (config.author){ %><meta name="author" content="<%= config.author %>"><% } %>
<% if (page.description){ %>
<meta name="description" content="<%= page.description.trim() %>">
<% } else if (typeof(auto_keyword_desc) == 'function' && page.content){ %>
<%- auto_keyword_desc(page.content) %>
<% } else if (UserConfig.description){ %>
<meta name="description" content="<%= UserConfig.description %>">
<% } else if (page.excerpt){ %>
<meta name="description" content="<%= strip_html(page.excerpt).trim() %>">
<% } else if (page.content){ %>
<meta name="description" content="<%= strip_html(page.content).trim().substring(0, 150) %>">
<% } %>
<% if (page.keywords){ %><meta name="keywords" content="<%= page.keywords %>"><% } %>
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">

<% if (page.title){ %><meta property="og:title" content="<%= page.title %>"/><% } %>
<meta property="og:site_name" content="<%= UserConfig.title -%>"/>
<% if(page.cover) { %><meta property="og:image" content="<%= page.cover %>" />
<% } else if(config.cover){ %> <meta property="og:image" content="<%= config.cover %>"/><%}%>

<link rel="alternate" href="<% if (UserConfig.rss){ %><%- RealPath(UserConfig.rss) %><% } else if (config.feed.path){ %><%- RealPath(config.feed.path) %><% } else { %><%- config.root %>atom.xml<% } %>" title="<%= UserConfig.title %> Feed" type="application/atom+xml">

<% if (theme.google_analytics){ %>
<script type="text/javascript">
  var _gaq = _gaq || [];
  _gaq.push(['_setAccount', '<%= theme.google_analytics %>']);
  _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);

  (function() {
    var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
    ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
  })();
</script>
<% } %>

d5q2mzgybqcny5s1.content:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <%
  var title = [];
  if (page.current > 1) title.push(__('page', page.current));
  if (page.title) title.push(page.title);
  if (page.category) title.push(page.category);
  if (page.tag) title.push(page.tag);
  if (page.archive){
    if (page.year) title.push(__('archive_b', page.year + (page.month ? '/' + page.month : '')));
    else title.push(__('archive_a'));
  }
  title.push(config.title);
  %>
  <title><%= title.join(' | ') %></title>
  <% if (config.author){ %><meta name="author" content="<%= config.author %>"><% } %>
  <% if (page.description){ %>
  <meta name="description" content="<%= page.description %>">
  <% } else if (config.description){ %>
  <meta name="description" content="<%= config.description %>">
  <% } else if (page.excerpt){ %>
  <meta name="description" content="<%= strip_html(page.excerpt).replace(/^\s*/, '').replace(/\s*$/, '') %>">
  <% } else if (page.content){ %>
  <meta name="description" content="<%= strip_html(page.content).replace(/^\s*/, '').replace(/\s*$/, '').substring(0, 150) %>">
  <% } %>
  <% if (page.keywords){ %><meta name="keywords" content="<%= page.keywords %>"><% } %>
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1">

  <% if (page.title){ %><meta property="og:title" content="<%= page.title %>"/><% } %>
  <meta property="og:site_name" content="<%= config.title %>"/>

  <% if(page.cover) { %>
    <meta property="og:image" content="<%= page.cover %>" />
  <% } else { %>
    <meta property="og:image" content="<%= config.cover %>"/>
  <% } %>

  <link href="<%- config.root %>favicon.png" rel="icon">
  <link rel="alternate" href="<% if (theme.rss){ %><%- theme.rss %><% } else { %><%- config.root %>atom.xml<% } %>" title="<%= config.title %>" type="application/atom+xml">
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="<%- config.root %>css/style.css" media="screen" type="text/css">
  <!--[if lt IE 9]><script src="//html5shiv.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/html5.js"></script><![endif]-->
  <%- partial('google_analytics') %>
</head>
